subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Coach John Dunne has taken St. Peter’s to the MAAC tournament title for the first time since 1995, and a berth in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: Coach John Dunne has taken St. Peter’s to the MAAC tournament title for the first time since 1995, and a berth in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
